document.discussion_title: Check Out Hugo Boss' First-Ever Smart Watch
document.topic_text: Check Out Hugo Boss' First-Ever Smart Watch I feel the smart watches have limited buyers. Even the leader apple is pulling back from the smart watch market. Samsung is also rolling back their smart watch collections. Link:
